movie_title: plan - English Word of the Day
introduction: Learn EnglishClass101's word of the day #shorts #English #EnglishClass101

vocabulary.definition: to reach a resolution or make a choice after consideration
vocabulary.example: I need to decide which restaurant to go to for dinner.

vocabulary.definition: with attention to detail or with caution
vocabulary.example: She followed the recipe carefully to bake the perfect cake.

vocabulary.definition: messages or alerts received on a device to inform about new information
vocabulary.example: I turned off my notifications to focus better on my work.

vocabulary.definition: to examine or assess something again
vocabulary.example: Before the exam, it's essential to review all the key concepts.

vocabulary.definition: a firm decision to do or not to do something
vocabulary.example: She made a resolution to exercise regularly and eat healthier.
The mistake was a valuable lesson that taught her to be more cautious.
